7:30-8:00 ReservationWe ordered: Patatas bravas with alioli, tomato & ñora peppers €4Croquettes of Ibérico ham €1.60Bombeta de la Barceloneta €2Ibérico pork ribs with honey and mustard €8Ibérico butifarra with mushrooms and Santa Pau beans €9Stewed and glazed beef cheek €9Canelloni of baked butifarra with Bordeaux mushrooms €7Tomato Bread €3TAPEO was my husband and daughters #1 favorite restaurant in Barcelona!  HANDS DOWN WINNER for them!I can't begin to tell you what my favorite dish was.  I could have licked the plates before they headed back to be washed.I guess if I had to commit to a least favorite dish it would be the Beef Cheeks.  Not that the Beef Cheeks were bad by any stretch of the imagination.  They were just not as exciting as the other dishes we ordered.  They were much more tender than I had imagined but tasted like something I make at home.  My only regret is not ordering more things from the menu!  Go Hungry!  Order LOTS!  You will not be disappointed.
